Package com.project.moviebooking.service.impl

Class JwtServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.project.moviebooking.service.impl.JwtServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
JwtService
@Service public class JwtServiceImpl extends Object implements JwtService
Service implementation for JWT (JSON Web Token) generation and handling.

      Generates a token with the provided claims, username, and validity duration.

      username - The username associated with the token.
      validity - The validity duration of the token.

      Type Parameters:
